content: Much like the Red Loong Boss FIght, you will not be able to access and challenge this secret boss until obtaining a special item elswhere in Chapter 2.

The content is as follows:
Much like the Red Loong Boss FIght, you will not be able to access and challenge this secret boss until obtaining a special item elswhere in Chapter 2.
